700833f-a.title: Bronx: Cruger Avenue - Pelham Parkway South
700833f-a.text:
Cruger Ave. (in front of unfinished apartment houses), adjoining
and at (right to left) the S.E. corner of Pelham Parkway South. The
view is eastward across the undeveloped area between White Plains Road
and Cruger Ave. This are is part of the former John Jacob Astor estate.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
